00031 class wxStateChangeEvent : public wxNotifyEvent
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     wxStateChangeEvent( wxObject * origin );
00035     virtual wxEvent * Clone();
00036 };
00037 
00038 DECLARE_EVENT_TYPE( wxEVT_STATE_CHANGE, -1 )
00039 
00040 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*wxStateChangeEventFunction)(wxStateChangeEvent&);
00041 
00042 #define EVT_STATE(id, fn) \
00043     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY( wxEVT_STATE_CHANGE, id, -1, \
00044     (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) (wxCommandEventFunction) (wxNotifyEventFunction) \
00045     wxStaticCastEvent( wxStateChangeEventFunction, & fn ), (wxObject *) NULL ),
00046 
00047 DEFINE_EVENT_TYPE( wxEVT_STATE_CHANGE )

00401 // Binds events generated in the main window to event handlers
00402 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(MainFrame, wxFrame)
00403     EVT_MENU(evRegister, MainFrame::OnOpenRegisterDialog)
00404     EVT_MENU(wxID_EXIT, MainFrame::OnQuit)
00405     EVT_MENU(evDial, MainFrame::OnDial)
00406     EVT_MENU(evDialPad, MainFrame::OnOpenDialPad)
00407     EVT_MENU(evHangUp, MainFrame::OnHangUp)
00408     EVT_MENU(evHold, MainFrame::OnHold)
00409     EVT_MENU(evAutoHold, MainFrame::OnAutoHold)
00410     EVT_MENU(evRetrieve, MainFrame::OnRetrieve)
00411     EVT_MENU(wxID_ABOUT, MainFrame::OnAbout)
00412         EVT_STATE(wxID_ANY, MainFrame::OnStateChange)
00413         EVT_REGISTER_DIALOG_CLOSED(wxID_ANY, MainFrame::OnCloseRegisterDialog)
00414         EVT_DIAL_PAD_CLOSED(wxID_ANY, MainFrame::OnCloseDialPad)
00415 END_EVENT_TABLE()
